item.title: Hugo and Embedding Tableau Viz in Posts
item.description: Have you tried embedding an interactive Tableau visualization in a site generated by Hugo? This short article hopefully helps clarify how to get it done using shortcodes. What is Hugo If you are reading this, you are reading a site generated by Hugo. It is a really fast way to stand up your static site for blogs or showcasing your portfolio of work. There are tons and tons of resources for how to do that and below are a couple of articles that helped me.
